page.title: 13INTERVIEW cont.
page.content: Mr Phillips is secretary of the Baptist Chapel and knows everyone in the locality.The majority of the houses and farms are scattered except for about ten houses clustered around 'The Brigdend Inn' and Post Office and a similar number at the Fishguard end of the area. Mr Pillips was happy that some of the newcomers joined the community in it's language and culture but unfortunately some did not.It saddened him that people moving into the area could afford to pay higher prices than the local people for farmland and that young people had to leave their homes to seek employment elsewhere.
